General.Name: Voice Mobility International Inc
General.Description: Voice Mobility International, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, sells and markets messaging software systems in North America. It also offers unified communication services, including 1-800 numbers, voice recognition, fax to email, auto attendant, web-based telephony, and conferencing functionality services to small and medium size business professionals. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1600?609 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1C3
